author: Special Correspondent
text:
The body of J. Raja (23), a student, was found in a charred condition near a canal at Thoppampatti on Saturday.

According to the police, the deceased, who had come to visit his parents from Chennai, left for his family farm on Friday night. The Sanarpatti police, who found the body on Saturday, have registered a case.

Found hanging

In another incident, a worker of a private company, Ramasamy alias Srikanth (47), was found hanging from the ceiling of his house. The Dindigul Town North police have registered a case.
title: Charred body of student found in Dindigul
